name: KARTHIK BIBIREDDY
headline: Senior Software Engineer | Aspiring Quantitative Developer
professionalSummary: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years of hands-on expertise building distributed systems, scalable APIs, and data-intensive applications across Amazon and multiple startups. Proven track record of delivering high-performance backend systems, cloud-native architectures, and developer productivity tools. Strong foundation in computer science, systems design, and cloud platforms (AWS/GCP). Passionate about solving complex engineering problems and exploring data-driven technologies, including applications in finance.

workExperience.title: Software Development Engineer II
description: Led migration of reference price systems from DUB to ZAZ to diversify AWS server footprint enabling org-wide adoption and contributing 40% towards the org's infrastructure redcution goal
Eliminated 600K daily targeted promotional orders from reference price computations, improving pricing accuracy for 400K+ products across Amazon.
Revamped external pricing signal integration by defining SLAs and onboarding higher-quality data sources, boosting internal signal usage by 320bps.
Mentored an intern to design and launch a reference price debugging tool adopted org-wide, reducing support effort by 25%.
Owned and drove reduction of the team’s tech debt backlog by 20% through structured grooming, sprint planning, and stakeholder alignment.
Led concept-teaching integration into Alexa Auto, enabling custom voice commands via teachable AI and achieving 25% adoption within four weeks.
Delivered full-stack messaging and contacts applications for Stellantis vehicles, including Alexa voice integration and middleware optimization (Quattro team).

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
description: Integrated computer vision models into secure, performant web applications for face tracking and virtual try-on use cases.
Collaborated with research teams in brainstorming sessions to analyze computer vision algorithms and propose improvements to model accuracy and performance.
Optimized model execution with WebAssembly to ensure performance across devices with constrained memory and varying screen sizes.
Managed full cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps tooling; championed adoption of cloud-native practices within the team.
Engaged directly with customers to gather requirements and deliver integration support tailored to their application needs.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
description: Led end-to-end development of aerospace software solutions, from requirements to deployment.
Designed geolocation 3D mapping and ASDB-based aircraft tracking for ground control stations.
Built real-time Primary Flight Display (PFD) systems enabling in-flight monitoring and decision-making.
Developed internal APIs and tools to manage and scale the open-source avionics project, Airliner.
Transformed ground station UI into a modular multi-window system, enhancing multi-user workflows.
Ensured high-quality releases via code reviews, on-site acceptance testing, and outdoor flight trials.

workExperience.title: Software Developer Intern
description: Built custom applications using open-source NLP libraries to serve enterprise clients in the energy and finance sectors.
Developed a targeted news aggregation widget for McDermott’s homepage using topic modeling and keyword extraction.
Provided on-call support for core data pipelines ingesting from millions of global sources, ensuring reliable data delivery for Zdaly’s data vendor platform.

projects.title: Technical Analysis Platform for Financial Markets
description: Building a personal platform to backtest and analyze trading strategies using historical financial data, with event-driven AWS Lambda workflows, ETL pipelines for sentiment and technical analysis, and a React-based dashboard for strategy evaluation and performance tracking.

projects.title: Real Estate Investment Analysis Tool
description: Developed a web-based tool to evaluate real estate investment opportunities by comparing buying vs renting, incorporating inputs like purchase price, interest rate, taxes, and ownership costs to output projected ROI, breakeven points, and overall investment value in a clean, user-friendly interface.
